articles.title: ‘Canada stands with you,’ Carney says as MPs honour Tumbler Ridge victims

articles.title: Romanian Inflation Slows Less Than Expected as Tax Hikes Weigh
articles.description: Romanian inflation eased less than expected as the government’s tax hikes and austerity measures continue to weigh on prices and prevent the central bank from easing monetary policy.

articles.title: Saudi Oil Sales to China Jump After Prices Cut to Five-Year Low
articles.description: Saudi Arabia’s crude sales to top importer China for loading in March rose after the kingdom cut the price of its main oil grade for buyers in Asia to the lowest level in more than five years.
